caption.title: Effect of defoliation and competition on the above-ground (a), below-ground (b), total biomass (c) and root/shoot ratio (d) of invasive Mikania micrantha.
caption.p: Values are means Â±standard deviation. The different lowercase and uppercase letters indicate significant differences ( p<0.05) among the defoliation intensities of invasive Mikania micrantha growing with and without a native competitor, respectively. * indicates a significant difference ( p<0.05) between the treatments with or without the competitor.
